show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content: We talk to California Faculty Association leaders about their historic day of action yesterday; Steve Zeltzer has an... <!--more--> update on Fukushima; Abby Martin of Media Roots discusses Occupy Cal with investigative journalist Greg Palast; and we get an update on the School of the Americas.
